snippet: Sophia rolled to victory Friday in the 142nd Kentucky Oaks, the $1 million showcase for 3-year-old fillies, on Friday at Churchill Downs.
abstract: Cathryn Sophia wins Kentucky Oaks at Churchill Downs.
lead_paragraph: Sophia rolled to victory Friday in the 142nd Kentucky Oaks, the $1 million showcase for 3-year-old fillies, on Friday at Churchill Downs.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Horse Racing; Cathyrn Sophia Wins Oaks
